com.hazelcast.client.cache.impl

Class HazelcastClientCacheManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.cache.impl.AbstractHazelcastCacheManager
      • com.hazelcast.client.cache.impl.HazelcastClientCacheManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HazelcastCacheManager, Closeable, AutoCloseable, javax.cache.CacheManager

    public final class HazelcastClientCacheManager
extends AbstractHazelcastCacheManager
    CacheManager implementation for client side.

    Provides client side CacheManager functionality.

      • removeCacheConfigFromLocal

        protected void removeCacheConfigFromLocal(String cacheNameWithPrefix)
        Description copied from class: AbstractHazelcastCacheManager
        Removes the local copy of the cache configuration if one exists.

        The default implementation does not require it, but client implementation overrides this to track a local copy of the config.

        Overrides:
        removeCacheConfigFromLocal in class AbstractHazelcastCacheManager
        Parameters:
        cacheNameWithPrefix - the cache name
